name: productcomparisonmernapp
description: Test Imagine, a MERN-based comparison page that lets you compare 2 products. The page URL may look something like this: â€ƒhttps://.../compare?productIds[]=p1001&productIds[]=p22 This comparison page needs to show name, price, and ratings in a table for the 2 productIds in the URL. Mongo products table has fields {_id, name, price, ratings}.

scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
